Detailed Description

Implementation of the standard mv command.

Moves a file or the contents in a directory mymv [SOURCE] [DESTINATION]

Author:
Bishal Santra

movFile - moves a file

Moves a file from source to destination

Parameters:
srcFName - the absolute/relative path of the file while in source location
destFName - the absolute/relative path of the file while in destination location
echoOff - if set to 1, perror(..) messages will be printed
Returns:
void
